name: Kenny Survivors
description:
OVERVIEW

Kenny Survivors is a top down 2.5D shooter in which you must survive against an onslaught of enemies by using your trusty Fireball® to blast them back to the dank hole they crawled out from. 

You must use the XP acquired from defeating enemies to upgrades the attributes of your Fireball® with a range of effects including Damage, Speed, Size, and Cooldown.

But beware! For your XP and levels also double as your health! If you foolishly let any enemy get close enough to attack you, it will begin to drain your XP and levels! Once you reach level 0, you will fall to darkness...

Every minute that passes, your adversaries will grow in power. If you are brave enough and make it to the 10th minute, you win!

CONTROLS

LMB - Cast Fireball®

Space - Open Shop

WASD - Move

This was created for the first SEANJAMIN Game Jam competition between Sean and myself. The constraints were that we could only use the Micro Roughlike Asset Pack by Kenney, and had the randomly chosen theme of "Growth". Also I am aware that "Kenny" in the title is spelt differently to the name of the asset pack creator. They are completely unrelated.
